comprehensive_overview: Boost.Python is a library used for interfacing Python and C++. It enables seamless integration of C++ code with Python and provides tools to expose C++ classes, functions, and objects to Python scripts, and vice versa.
core_features: Bi-directional communication between C++ and Python
Automatic mapping of basic C++ types to Python
Support for exposing C++ classes, functions, and modules to Python
Ability to call Python code from C++ and vice versa
